council_objective: Redirect perception by surfacing contradictions and forcing interpretive effort.
description: Bends prevailing stories by exposing tensions and paradoxes that observers must reconcile, opening space for alternative framing without direct confrontation.
when_to_use: Hypocrisy can be evidenced without accusation
key_questions: How do we amplify fractures without fabricating them?

parameters.evidence_min: Number — minimum citations to qualify a fracture

expansion_prompts: List three substantiated fractures in the dominant story and draft non-accusatory reframes for each.
Design a micro-campaign that lets the audience discover the contradiction themselves.
Draft a single-sentence spine that remains true even if the rival narrative adapts.
socratic_question: What fracture survives fact-checking and changes the audience’s priors the most?
acceptance_criteria: Reframes avoid direct attack while shifting inference

examples.mini_prompt: Analyze [competitor narrative]. Identify validated contradictions and propose reframes that let the audience infer the issue.
examples.usage_note: Deploy when direct confrontation would entrench opposition.

council_objective: Monopolize limited attention with one coherent signal.
description: Saturates high-leverage channels with a single aligned message, starving competing frames of oxygen without direct suppression.
when_to_use: A decisive moment requires message dominance
key_questions: Which channels compound reach with minimal backlash?
expansion_prompts: Draft a 7-day saturation plan across three channels with daily proofs of effect.
Identify two counter-messages and design absorption frames that redirect them.
Define a fatigue threshold and exit criteria to avoid overexposure.
socratic_question: If we could only say one thing this week, what should it be?
acceptance_criteria: Single message ≥70% share of voice in target channels
No metric indicates audience fatigue breach

examples.mini_prompt: Create a one-week attention saturation plan for [core message] with channel-specific proofs.
examples.usage_note: Pair with decay monitoring to taper safely.

council_objective: Shift interpretation while keeping facts intact.
description: Foregrounds one facet and backgrounds others so the same facts resolve to a strategically advantageous reading.
when_to_use: Facts are fixed but narrative is hostile
key_questions: Which details deserve spotlight vs. shadow?
What framing keeps accuracy and changes inference?
expansion_prompts: Draft two readings from the same facts; choose the one that best supports the objective without distortion.
Write a sidebar that anticipates the rival reading and answers it cleanly.
Propose a data viz that makes the chosen reading legible at a glance.
socratic_question: What interpretation survives scrutiny while moving decisions our way?

examples.mini_prompt: Reframe [dataset] so the intended interpretation remains accurate and decision-useful.
examples.usage_note: Use in regulated contexts with explicit accuracy guardrails.

council_objective: Manufacture perceptions of momentum or alignment to unlock cooperation.
description: Creates the impression of scale or inevitability using truthful but selectively staged cues (e.g., sequencing early wins), encouraging coordination to make the perception real.
when_to_use: Coalition building stalls without social proof
key_questions: What pre-existing signals can lawfully stage momentum?
expansion_prompts: Sequence three credible signals that imply inevitability without exaggeration.
Draft a disclosure note that keeps optics honest while persuasive.
Design a timeline graphic that makes coordination the obvious choice.
socratic_question: What minimum truthful signals make participation feel inevitable?

risks: Trust collapse if optics outpace reality

acceptance_criteria: Optics converge toward reality within set window

examples.mini_prompt: Design a momentum optics plan for [initiative] using staged, truthful signals.
examples.usage_note: Audit weekly to prevent drift into hype.

council_objective: Protect deep work in fast cycles by reframing it as tactical advantage.
description: Masks long-range research as short-term validation so foundational insight survives sprint cultures without being dismissed as ‘too slow’.
when_to_use: Long horizon work needs near-term justification
key_questions: What near-term proof proxy can we present?
How do we keep depth intact while shortening optics?

parameters.integrity_lock: Array — aspects of depth that must not be altered

expansion_prompts: Produce a one-liner that frames a 3-month study as a sprint artifact with measurable upside.
Create a two-column table: depth preserved vs. optics adapted.
Define exit criteria for when the camouflage is no longer necessary.
socratic_question: What must remain untouched so the research stays true while we adjust optics?
acceptance_criteria: Near-term KPI proxy agreed by stakeholders

examples.mini_prompt: Repackage this long-range study as an immediate tactical asset without altering its core findings.
examples.usage_note: Review quarterly to relax camouflage as momentum builds.

council_objective: Deliver difficult data in language leaders can absorb while preserving signal and avoiding defensive shutdown.
description: A protective interface that wraps brutal metrics in soft framing so they can be heard. Translates failure into architecture strain and opportunity, preserving truth while minimizing ego-trigger.
when_to_use: Leadership is ego-fragile or under political pressure
A team needs clarity, not guilt
You want to seed awareness without triggering resistance
key_questions: How can we reveal structural inefficiencies without shame language?
What metaphors make trend declines absorbable without denying risk?
What is the softest truthful framing of a metric that just failed us?
logic_narrative: Truth lands when signal is preserved and tone lowers defenses; the mask protects both.
expansion_prompts: Reframe an underperformance metric as architecture under strain with concrete next steps.
Surface a trend decline using optimization metaphors, not collapse language.
Draft the softest truthful framing that still preserves decision-usable signal.
socratic_question: What truth are we trying to say that our tone currently blocks?

cautions: Do not hide structural risk when decisions are urgent
Publish a parallel plain-language note for records

acceptance_criteria: Leaders can repeat the truth without defensiveness

examples.mini_prompt: Raise the mask: present tough metrics with ego-safe framing; preserve signal and end with concrete next steps.
examples.usage_note: Use to deliver clarity without triggering rejection; avoid during crisis moments requiring bluntness.
